00042     template<class Socket>
00043     class SocketHandle
00044     {
00045     public:
00046         friend class TCPSocket;
00047         friend class SCTPSocket;
00048 
00050         typedef Socket socket_type;
00051 
00053         SocketHandle() : m_sockfd(0) {}
00054 
00055         SocketHandle( SocketHandle& other)
00056         : m_sockfd( other.release()) {}
00057 
00059         SocketHandle( SocketHandle_Ref<Socket> other)
00060         : m_sockfd( other.sockfd) {}
00061 
00062         operator SocketHandle_Ref<Socket>()
00063         { return SocketHandle_Ref<Socket>( release()); }
00065 
00066         SocketHandle&
00067         operator=( SocketHandle& other)
00068         {
00069             reset( other.release());
00070             return *this;
00071         }
00072 
00073         ~SocketHandle() { reset(); }
00074 
00076 
00082         operator bool() const { return m_sockfd > 0; }
00083 
00084     private:
00086         explicit SocketHandle( int sockfd) : m_sockfd(sockfd) {}
00087 
00089 
00092         int release()
00093         {
00094             int tmp = m_sockfd;
00095             m_sockfd = 0;
00096             return tmp;
00097         }
00098 
00100 
00104         void reset( int fd = 0)
00105         {
00106             if( fd != m_sockfd)
00107             {
00108                 TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY (::close(m_sockfd));
00109                 m_sockfd = fd;
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113         int m_sockfd;
00114     };

00119     class SocketHandle_Ref
00120     {

00122
